analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders a THC percentage badge for a product, including dynamic SVG background colors based on the THC value.
analysis.Purpose: Display the product’s THC attribute as a styled badge in product listings or detail views.

Components.name: THC
Components.responsibility: Receive a product object via props, read its attributes[1].value (THC percentage), display the value and the label 'THC', and render one of four SVG polygons colored by threshold.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare the incoming props for the <script setup> block.

Functions.name: Number
Functions.purpose: Convert the string value of product.attributes[1].value to a Number for threshold comparisons in v-if.

analysis.Usage: Imported as a child component in product‐related views or cards (e.g. `import THC from 'modules/products/components/elements/THC.vue'`) and used in templates by passing a `product` prop.
Notes: Relies on product.attributes[1] existing; no fallback if attribute is missing or out of bounds beyond the v-if.
Imports `ref` but does not use it; could be removed to clean up.
SCSS uses CSS variable `--white` for stroke color and includes a media query to scale down on narrower viewports.
Threshold logic is hardcoded; future improvements could refactor it into a computed or helper.
